{"policy_name": "Password Policy", "effective_date": "2024-09-01", "content": "
## Corporate Password Policy (Effective 2024‑09‑01)

### 1. Scope
This policy applies to all employees, contractors, and third‑party users who access corporate systems.

### 2. General Requirements
- Minimum length: 12 characters
- Must include at least three of the following categories: uppercase, lowercase, numeric, special characters
- No reuse of the last 12 passwords
- Passwords must be changed every 180 days

### 3. Privileged Accounts
- Minimum length: 16 characters
- Must include all four character categories (uppercase, lowercase, numeric, special)
- No reuse of the last 24 passwords
- Passwords must be changed every 90 days
- Multi‑factor authentication (MFA) is mandatory for all privileged access
- Passwords cannot contain user identifiers or common dictionary words
- Storage: Privileged passwords must be stored only in the approved corporate password manager and never written down or saved in plain‑text files.

### 4. Enforcement
Violations will be subject to disciplinary action per the Employee Conduct Guidelines.

### 5. Exceptions
Any exception must be approved in writing by the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)."}

Here are the password‑policy requirements for **privileged accounts** (from the latest policy version effective 2024‑09‑01):

- **Minimum length:** 16 characters
- **Character composition:** Must include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters (all four categories)
- **Password reuse limit:** Cannot reuse any of the last 24 passwords
- **Change frequency:** Passwords must be changed at least every 90 days
- **Multi‑factor authentication:** Mandatory for all privileged access
- **Prohibited content:** Passwords may not contain user identifiers, employee numbers, or common dictionary words
- **Storage requirement:** Must be stored only in the approved corporate password manager; never written down or saved in plain‑text files.

If you need the full policy document or have any other questions, just let me know!
